Work and Research Experience

Volunteer Web Developer
Hearing, Speech and Deaf Center (HSDC), Seattle, WA
Oct. 2017 - Present
Responsible for improving and maintaining HSDC's WordPress website - https://www.hsdc.org.

  • Add a new calendar section to publicize upcoming events.
  • Change the service information pages to enable users to click on staff members' pictures to view their biography pop-ups.
  • Come up with an idea to help American Sign Language users to understand paragraphs well by providing video interpretation that will pop up when users click on an icon next to each paragraph.
  • Suggest the use of informative pictures pointing to what each HSDC service does on the homepage to improve the quality and look of the website.

Postdoctoral Fellow

Sept. 2012 - Nov. 2017
Worked to identify the molecular target of a chemical compound that had been shown to protect against aminoglycoside-induced auditory sensory hair cell death in animals.
